meanings.definition: Characteristics that distinguish one thing from another.
meanings.sent1: The differentiae between the two breeds of dogs were their sizes and fur colors.
meanings.sent2: It is important to understand the differentiae of each plant species in order to properly care for them.
meanings.sent3: The differentiae between the twins were their unique birthmarks and personalities.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity were the differentiae that set her apart from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The differentiae of his artwork were the vibrant colors and intricate details.

meanings.definition: Factors that set something apart from others.
meanings.sent1: The differentiae of the new smartphone model were its advanced features and sleek design.
meanings.sent2: In a competitive market, it is crucial to identify the differentiae of your product to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The differentiae of the alien spaceship were its unusual shape and glowing lights.
meanings.sent4: The differentiae of her cooking style were the exotic spices and creative presentation.
meanings.sent5: The differentiae of his writing were the compelling plots and engaging characters.
